content.question: Based on the data in the table, which of the following will happen if Country X and Country Y agree to specialize and trade based on their comparative advantage?

choices.label: Country X will export cars, and both countries will gain from trade if <math alttext="1" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math> car is exchanged for <math alttext="3" overflow="scroll"><mn>3</mn></math> motorcycles.

Country X will export motorcycles, and both countries will gain from trade if <math alttext="1" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math> car is exchanged for <math alttext="5" overflow="scroll"><mn>5</mn></math> motorcycles.

Country Y will export cars, and both countries will gain from trade if <math alttext="1" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math> car is exchanged for <math alttext="3" overflow="scroll"><mn>3</mn></math> motorcycles.

Country Y will export motorcycles, and both countries will gain from trade if <math alttext="1" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math> car is exchanged for <math alttext="5" overflow="scroll"><mn>5</mn></math> motorcycles.

Country Y will export motorcycles, and both countries will gain from trade if <math alttext="1" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math> car is exchanged for <math alttext="7" overflow="scroll"><mn>7</mn></math> motorcycles.

content.answer: Country X will export motorcycles, and both countries will gain from trade if <math alttext="1" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math> car is exchanged for <math alttext="5" overflow="scroll"><mn>5</mn></math> motorcycles.
